Dr Divine Ndhlukula bụ nwanyị Zimbabwe na-azụ ahịa, onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke DDNS Security Operations (Pvt) Ltd nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide SECURICO Security Services
Dr Ndhlukula bụkwa onye isi oche nke ZNCC Women's Desk.
A mụrụ ya na abalị ise, na onwa Febụwarị, na afọ 1960 na ime obodo Gutu nke Mary na Piniel Simbi
O tolitere na Gutu, ebe ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, nke bụ, Zvinavashe School, Machingambi School, Bondolfi Mission, St
Domincs Secondary School, Makumbe Mission
Ọ lụrụ Stanely Ndhlukula (onye nwụrụ anwụ) ma nwee otu nwa nwoke - David Simbi na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka Executive Masters na Business Administration (MBA) na Midlands State University ma nwee MBA ọzọ na Women's University na Africa na PhD na Business Leadership na Women's University nke e nyere maka nkwanye ùgwù maka ndu azụmahịa ya na atụmatụ ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Zimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation na Old Mutual ruo afọ isii dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego wee sonye na Intermarket Life Assurance dị ka onye isi ahịa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na isii wee pụọ chọta SECURICO.

O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa Securico site na mmalite dị ala na Zimbabwe n'afọ 1998 N'ajụjụ ọnụ o kwuru na ochepụtara echiche ịmepụta Securico n'ihi mkpa ọ dị inweta ihe eji ebi ndụ mana ọ dị oke mkpa iji gbanwee ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa nke ụmụ nwoke na-achịkwa. Mgbe ọ na-agwa akwụkwọ akụkọ Zimbabwe okwu, o kwuru,
Echere m na enwere oghere na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị nọ n'ebe ahụ anaghị ebi ndụ kwekọrọ na mkpa nke ndị ahịa
A ma ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ama maka ọgụ nwamba ọhịa na ndị nche n'ozuzu ha bụ ndị a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala na ngalaba ọ bụla

Achọrọ m ịgbanwe echiche ma mepụta niche nke ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịmepụta ọrụ ma amaara m na ọ dị m mkpa ịbanye na ụzọ dị iche na ụzọ ahụ ga-eme ka ọdịche dị iche, ndị mmadụ ga-abụ isi ma ọ bụ isi ihe ọhụụ ahụ.
Securico bụ ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa mbụ nke Zimbabwe nke a kwadoro na ISO9001: 2008 Quality Management System.
Forbes kpọrọ Dr Divine Ndhlukula otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na Africa
O bụ ya bu onye nwe Zvikomborero Farms, ụlọ ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ ugbo dị iche iche ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a ndị ọrụ 17 na-adịgide adịgide na ihe karịrị 12 na nwa oge.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018, a kpọkwara Dr Ndhlukula aha n'ime ndị isi iri kachasị elu na Afrịka.

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Mentorship in Practice programme, Woman Owned Brand initiative, nke sitere na Women in Enterprise Conference and Awards platform nke ọ malitere n'afọ 2013 iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị aka ịkwalite azụmahịa ha
Bụrụ onye otu SADC mbụ na Women Presidents Organization.
Azụmahịa ya enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke gụnyere;
